data.description:
Conquer your fear of spiders! Itsy is an exposure therapy game intended to reduce fear of spiders. The player interacts with spiders by completing novel tasks, collecting points and beating boss stages whilst getting dynamic coaching from a virtual therapist. Starting with a cartoony spider, intensity gradually increases with game progression. 

Itsy was developed in cooperation with world leading researchers at Stockholm University.
